projects.name: 2K
projects.tagline: AI-powered training coach for a sub-6:30 2K erg
projects.description: Ingests training data from Concept2 ErgData, Whoop, Withings, and MyFitnessPal. Uses Claude as the reasoning engine to detect trends and adjust training plans. Serves a web dashboard for daily logging, trend visualization, and AI chat.
projects.currentFocus: Core architecture and data ingestion setup
nextSteps: Implement data ingestion from ErgData CSV exports
Build daily logging dashboard in Streamlit
Integrate Claude for training plan adjustments

projects.name: Auto-Spin
projects.tagline: ESP32-S3 BLE accessory with AMOLED display
projects.description: Battery-powered BLE accessory built on a LILYGO T-Display-S3 AMOLED (ESP32-S3). Pairs with iPhone over Bluetooth and sends timed button-press events. Features a 240x536 AMOLED display with live connection status, session stats, and procedural animations.

projects.name: Bitcoin AI Agent
projects.tagline: Automated Bitcoin analysis with Claude trading decisions
projects.description: Two-component system: a React dashboard computes technical indicators (RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, etc.) from live CoinGecko data, and a Node.js agent scrapes the dashboard with Puppeteer, sends analysis to Claude, and logs BUY/SELL/HOLD decisions.
projects.currentFocus: Project complete — cost tracking wired in

projects.name: Concept2 Data
projects.tagline: Real-time PM5 erg dashboard with stroke-level analytics
projects.description: Connects to a Concept2 PM5 via USB (CSAFE protocol), captures per-stroke metrics (drive length, force curves, watts, pace, SPM, heart rate), stores in SQLite, and streams to a browser dashboard over WebSocket. Includes live dashboard, Rowing View, and Session History.
projects.currentFocus: MVP and Rowing View complete, testing with real PM5 hardware
nextSteps: Test USB connection with physical PM5

projects.name: DisneyME
projects.tagline: Family Disney World trip PWA with offline support
projects.description: Mobile-first Progressive Web App for the Dockins family Disney World trip (Feb 22-24, 2026). Covers three park days with swipeable tabs, live countdown, activity checkboxes, Lightning Lane counter, offline support, and dark mode. Installable on iPhone.
projects.currentFocus: Project complete and ready for the trip

projects.name: Paper Trader
projects.tagline: Paper stock trading system with AI-powered signal analysis
projects.description: Identifies NYSE/Nasdaq stocks with 5%+ return potential within 1-2 weeks. Phase 1 screens using ATR and swing analysis with quality filters. Phase 2 adds 15 technical indicators, rule-based signals, Claude-powered validation, a Morning Sentinel news agent, and a Streamlit dashboard.
projects.currentFocus: Both phases complete — cost tracking wired in

projects.name: jjdockins.com
projects.tagline: Personal portfolio and project showcase website
projects.description: Personal website hosted on GitHub Pages featuring a portfolio landing page, Project Blueprint career exploration showcase, and individual project pages. Built from scratch as a web development learning project.
projects.currentFocus: API Costs page added, deploy pipeline set up

projects.name: API Costs
projects.tagline: Anthropic API cost dashboard with automated weekly deploy
projects.description: Pulls cost and usage data from the Anthropic Admin API, generates per-project breakdowns (2K, Bitcoin AI Agent, Paper Trader), and deploys a visual dashboard to jjdockins.com. Automated weekly via launchd. Also includes per-call self-tracking wired into all 3 AI projects.
projects.currentFocus: Complete — Admin API integration, web dashboard, weekly auto-deploy
